keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

byline.original: By AURELIEN BREEDEN and LILIA BLAISE
byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden reported from Paris, and Lilia Blaise from Brussels. Reporting was contributed by Dan Bilefsky from London, Neil Collier from Brussels, Adam Nossiter from Paris and Eric Schmitt from Austin, Tex.

lead_paragraph: Reda Kriket, 34, who was arrested last week in a suburb of Paris, has a long history of criminal and jihadist activity, the Paris prosecutor said.

headline.print_headline: Frenchman Plotting ‘Imminent’ Attack Is Charged With Terrorism
headline.main: Frenchman Plotting ‘Imminent’ Attack Is Charged With Terrorism

snippet: Reda Kriket, 34, who was arrested last week in a suburb of Paris, has a long history of criminal and jihadist activity, the Paris prosecutor said.
abstract: French authorities say suspected Islamic State operative Reda Kriket was found to have been in possession of large trove of guns and bomb-making equipment, ratcheting up fears that militants are planning further attacks in Europe.
